name: Apple WWDC San Jose
description: Apple WWDC (Worldwide Developers Conference) San Jose is Appleâ€™s annual flagship event for developers worldwide. The conference focuses on software engineering, mobile development, iOS/macOS platforms, AI and machine learning, UX/UI design, and product innovation. WWDC features keynote presentations by Apple executives, technical sessions, coding labs, hands-on workshops, and networking opportunities for developers. The event is hybrid, allowing both in-person attendance in San Jose and virtual participation globally.
